alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 13 at 3:40AM PDT until March 13 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR THE BASE OF THE SOUTHERN BLUE MOUNTAINS OF OREGON... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected for the base of the Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon. * WHERE...Foothills of the Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon. * WHEN...From 8 AM this morning to 8 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon
